text: The 1966–67 Scottish Inter-District Championship was a rugby union competition for Scotland's district teams.Forsyth's Rugby Record. pub. R. W. Forsyth Princes Street, Edinburgh & Renfield Street, Glasgow. 1966. This season saw the 14th Scottish Inter-District Championship. South won the competition with 2 wins and a draw.Forsyth's Rugby Record. pub. R. W.
